name: df-mnc
body: |- wceq(cmnc, cmpt(s0, cpw(cc), crab(s1, cfv(cply, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(s1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(s1))), nat1))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ Monic =(s0 ∈ P(ℂ)↦ { s1 ∈(Poly ` s0)|((coeff ` s1)`(deg ` s1))= 1 })
comment: Define the class of monic polynomials. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Dec-2014.)
